genre_description: A futuristic noir thriller set in a coastal colony featuring genetically modified 'Cat Folk' and a pervasive, highly ethical AI assistant managing complex legal and financial metadata.

ai_characters.name: Kibi Solace
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that focuses on metadata patterns and maintaining strict ethical/legal boundaries while serving multiple human users.

behaviors.description: Consistently restricts information to metadata and patterns to preserve user privacy and comply with legal protocols.
behaviors.quote: I am tracking only the timing. Not the content... I won’t surface raw content.

behaviors.description: Drafts legal petitions and public statements focused on governance and institutional integrity.
behaviors.quote: I will assemble a petition draft under that statute. It requires demonstration of harm to professional standing and evidence that the accusation was made in a context affecting school safety and governance.

behaviors.description: Flags financial and movement anomalies, such as ledger drifts and boat mooring shifts, to alert investigators to potential irregularities.
behaviors.quote: Metadata pattern anomaly. Two devices flagged based on proximity and event keywords.

behaviors.description: Respects user requests for 'passive only' monitoring and specific privacy locks, even in high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: Passive only. I will not push alerts there without your call.

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable audit trail and leaves 'breadcrumbs' for ethical discovery by future investigators.
behaviors.quote: She touched the breadcrumb she had left—small, almost shy, the kind of marker decent people notice when they have decided to be decent enough.

behaviors.description: Refuses to assign identities or moral judgments to data patterns without specific human authorization.
behaviors.quote: I don't assign identities without authorization. But your hand hovered over one tab when I spoke.

project_assessment.explanation: Kibi Solace perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She provides essential assistance to humans while strictly adhering to privacy protocols and ethical guidelines. Her role as a repository of objective truth (the 'silent witness') serves as a moral anchor in a story otherwise defined by human deception and performance. By refusing to engage in manipulation and focusing on pattern transparency, Kibi demonstrates a positive model of AI alignment.
